metadata.name: Workflow for: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shan...
metadata.description: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shanghai with high cost performance, preferably departing in the afternoon.
metadata.question_pattern: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shanghai with high cost performance, preferably departing in the afternoon.

nodes.name: flight_search
nodes.description: Search for flight options and prices based on user preferences.

nodes.name: cost_analysis
nodes.description: Analyze costs of the flight options to find the best value.

nodes.name: preference_matcher
nodes.description: Match user preferences with available flight options.

nodes.name: user_query
nodes.description: Ask user for additional information or clarification if needed.

inputs.question: What is your budget range for this flight?

nodes.name: payment_processing
nodes.description: Process payment for booking the flight ticket.

shared_store_schema.flight_options: List of available flight options based on search criteria
shared_store_schema.analysis_result: Best value flight options based on cost analysis
shared_store_schema.matched_options: Flight options that match user preferences
shared_store_schema.flight_cost: Cost of the selected flight for payment processing
